General.Name: Sam Holdings Corp
General.Description: Sam Holdings Corporation manufactures and trades wires and cables for telecommunications under the SACOM brand in Vietnam. It also engages in financial investment, residential real estate, recreational real estate, and hi-tech agriculture businesses. It provides office for lease; invests in apartments development; undertakes infrastructure and other real estate projects; offers recreation and tourism services; and owns and operates black pepper processing plant in Dak Nong with crop area of 3000 hectares. The company was formerly known as SACOM Investment and Development Joint Stock Company. Sam Holdings Corporation was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
